Developer's guide
=================

This section is here for those who are building/exploring the
internals of PMIx in its source code form, most likely through a
developer's tree (i.e., a Git clone).

If you are simply *using* PMIx, you probably don't need to read this
section.

   :maxdepth: 2

   git-github
   compiler-pickyness
   autogen
   building-pmix
   terminology
   source-code
   frameworks
   gnu-autotools
   sphinx
   rst-for-markdown-expats.rst
